attributes.action: prove an Englishman's home is a castle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That this Government should alter the present laws, so that there is NO automatic right of entry to any domestic property.
Should automatic right of entry be required, it can be granted only by an English Court.
All persons involved in the granting of such an order, shall be held accountable for it

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
